resources.string: Note: All settings of this example app will be cleared after a restart.
This example has no customizations. Debug is enabled.
In this example the default icon (app icon) has been replaced with a cusom icon. Debug is enabled.
This example uses the custom feedback dialog instead of the mail feedback dialog. Debug is enabled.
In this example the show never button is displayed. Debug is enabled.

In this example debug is disabled. The dialog will show on the third click. If the \"Later\" button is clicked, the dialog will show again after 5 more clicks. You can also use the \"Never\" button. \nAttention: If you have already clicked the never button of another example, this dialog will not show until you restart the app.
In this example the rating threshold was set to 4.5. So you need to rate at least 4.5 stars to see the store rating dialog. Debug is enabled.
